pullRequest.title: Remove obsolete TODO notes
pullRequest.bodyText:
We don't use JDBC jar in tests, we take it from classpath.
We do not need report dir for now. We may add it in the future, but
keeping this TODO in the code does not make it more likely.

commit.message:
Remove obsolete TODO notes

We don't use JDBC jar in tests, we take it from classpath.

We do not need report dir for now. We may add it in the future, but
keeping this TODO in the code does not make it more likely.

nodes.bodyText: why is this obsolete? do we collect reports in a way that are accessible outside of docker container?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -163,8 +163,7 @@ private Environment getEnvironment()
                                         // "-agentlib:jdwp=transport=dt_socket,server=y,suspend=n,address=5007", // TODO implement sth like --debug switch
                                         "-Djava.util.logging.config.file=/docker/presto-product-tests/conf/tempto/logging.properties",
                                         "-Duser.timezone=Asia/Kathmandu",
-                                        "-jar", "/docker/test.jar", // TODO "-cp", "/docker/presto-jdbc.jar:..." "io.prestosql.tests.TemptoProductTestRunner"
-                                        // TODO "--report-dir" "/docker/test-reports/$(date "+%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S")"
